responses: Take regular physical activity, that can help improve mood and reduce feelings of depression. Like you can take a part of morning walk. You can take a part of meditation or yoga that can help you focus on the present moment and reduce feelings of stress and anxiety. Getting enough sleep, you should sleep at least 6-9 hours. Set a goal. Doing things that you enjoy like hobbies, activities or things that you like to do. Try to do this 14 days then tell me your condition
